bug.author: yaroslavvb
bug.description:
I just started a new run. The "logs" section is are correct, showing it on first epoch, but the graphs show 500 minutes worth of data, wondering where this metrics are coming from. There's an earlier run with same name, but I didn't think this should matter <denchmark-link:https://app.wandb.ai/yaroslavvb/Transformer-XL%20source%20code/runs/mn6ancca?workspace=user-yaroslavvb>https://app.wandb.ai/yaroslavvb/Transformer-XL%20source%20code/runs/mn6ancca?workspace=user-yaroslavvb</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23068/65743797-ffab7680-e0aa-11e9-846a-6f191fc94c0c.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23068/65743859-3e413100-e0ab-11e9-9029-af03e6d504be.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23068/65743871-46996c00-e0ab-11e9-9a62-b1c06db740dd.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.81. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/wandb/client>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
The graphs seems to have refreshed and are now showing correct metrics for this run

It's happening again, just launched a fresh run, and the graphs are showing 500 minutes worth of data which is too long for this run. Checked in incognito window, showing same thing. <denchmark-link:https://app.wandb.ai/yaroslavvb/Transformer-XL%20source%20code/runs/1twzi1oq?workspace=user-yaroslavvb>https://app.wandb.ai/yaroslavvb/Transformer-XL%20source%20code/runs/1twzi1oq?workspace=user-yaroslavvb</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23068/65813183-749fae80-e186-11e9-96cc-25f6d744d857.png></denchmark-link>
The logs are correct though <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23068/65813185-78333580-e186-11e9-9341-056260a755e7.png></denchmark-link>
Checking 10 minutes later, and the time scale is normal again
Oh....it's "Time" switching from seconds to Minutes, it wasn't actually 500 minutes worth of data
